amendment.description: To include the liberation of Helmand Province in the list of historic battles where United States Marines served.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3936 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3936 proposed by Senator Blumenthal. To include the liberation of Helmand Province in the list of historic battles where United States Marines served.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3936 proposed by Senator Blumenthal.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3936 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
